name: Might & Magic Heroes: Era of Chaos
summary: Journey back to Might & Magic Heroes III’s Erathia and join Queen Catherine Ironfist on a quest to restore the Kingdom of Erathia ravaged by war. Summon legendary heroes, assemble massive armies of mythical creatures, mighty knights and powerful spellcasters, and use strategy and magic to prevail in battle.
